data.title: Terramate joins the CNCF as a Silver Member
data.meta_description: We are very proud to announce that Terramate has become a Silver member of the Cloud Native Computing Foundation速 (also known as the CNCF速) and has joined the ranks of many other tech industry leaders committed to cloud-native platforms, projects, and technologies.
data.text:
We are very proud to announce that Terramate has become a Silver member of the Cloud Native Computing Foundation速 (also known as the CNCF速) and has joined the ranks of many other tech industry leaders committed to cloud-native platforms, projects, and technologies.

Joining the Cloud Native Computing Foundation will allow Terramate to be at the forefront of the cloud-native revolution by:

Listening to the aspirations of the cloud-native community.

Representing the needs of our growing customer base.

Helping and contributing to the adoption of the growing ecosystem of open-source projects the CNCF fosters with great success.

But, that is not all. We participate in this fantastic organization in multiple ways. On top of being a Silver member of the CNCF ourselves, Terramate is also part of the community driving the development, maintenance, and adoption of the OpenTofu project, which recently became managed by the Linux Foundation.

This means you will see a lot more of us around the community. We will be participating in delivering content to the CNCF Blog and webinars, and also be part of the live events, such as KubeCon / Cloud-Native Con. So be on the lookout for all the great new stuff coming.
